title: Allow a configurable stack size (-Xss)
description: The Java stack size should be a configuration option in the solr.in.sh and solr.in.cmd instead of being set specifically within the startup script.

comments.author: Steve Davids
comments.content: Added patch that preserves the previously set -Xss256k value in the appropriate solr.in.sh and solr.in.cmd files.
